game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden temple dedicated to the long-forgotten Moon Goddess. The temple is said to contain an ancient scroll holding the secrets of the goddess's power. Brave adventurers, assemble and retrieve this powerful artifact!
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to dark magic

tasks.objective: Gather information about the temple's location.
tasks.description: Speak with local villagers and gather rumors about the temple's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Explore the nearby forest for any clues.
tasks.description: Venture into the Whispering Woods and search for hidden markings or ancient ruins that might lead you to the temple.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess.
tasks.description: Brave the treacherous traps and puzzles within the temple, and claim the ancient scroll as your reward.
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
